components: ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL
summary: WHILE, BACKING OUT OF GARAGE THE CAR ACCELERATED ON ITS OWN.  KIA ROAD  TESTED THE CAR AND COULD NOT REPLICATE THE PROBLEM.  A DIAGNOSTIC TEST PERFORMED BY J.B.A. KIA OF ELLICOTT CITY, MD FOUND NOTHING WRONG.  THIS IS THE SECOND TIME THAT THE  CAR HAS HAD A SUDDEN UNINTENDED ACCELERATION INCIDENT.     THE  FIRST INCIDENT WAS REPORTED TO NHTSA IN JANUARY 2010, CONFIRMATION (ODI NUMBER) FOR THAT REPORT IS 10375033.  KIA REPLACED THE ACCELERATOR PEDAL POSITION SENSOR ON 1/18/2011.  *TR
